file_content.text: Belsavis will be destroyed unless we act.
I will answer all your questions when we meet with your Council.
You should not stay here. Even I cannot protect you from every Sith in this fortress.
Step away from my ship. We're leaving.
If I wished to fight, I would not have freed your crew or killed these guards.
Sith = telling truth // Sith = freed us + secured hangar
More guards will come. Shall we go before they arrive?
You can come--if you offer unconditional surrender.
Only if you're my prisoner.
If that is my destiny, so be it.
Free Master Tol Braga and my fellow Jedi, and I'll consider it.
Where are the other Jedi?
If they were here, I'd have liberated them as well.
Our last duel was interrupted. This one won't be.
Prepare to die.
Destroy me, and the galaxy dies.
I could've killed you on Quesh, had I wanted. Did you never wonder why I hesitated?
I have waited over three hundred years to see the face that came to me in a vision. Your face.
I am much older than you think.
What else did this vision of yours reveal?
That's all you saw?
Many things, but only one that interests me.
You could've told me this on Quesh--or in your master's fortress.
Why didn't you help me before?
I needed to be sure the time had come. Now I know.
Only a few beings have ever broken the Emperor's domination. You and that girl are special.
We're running out of time. If you have a point, make it.
That explains nothing.
Kira and I have the power to destroy your master.
We're a threat to the Emperor.
Not yet. Not without my help.
She only broke the Emperor's will with my help. I freed myself.
Forget about Kira.
Regardless, my former master no longer holds any power over your minds.
Though the Emperor seeks to conceal his true plans, I have seen them. That vision has driven me to this....
I pledge my loyalty to you. Take me to your Jedi Council on Tython, and I'll reveal why.
We're not actually considering this? I mean, he's obviously full of awful.
I can't believe I'm saying this, but I'm with Doc. This is a trap.
I seek to save this galaxy from annihilation. Without my help, your ship will never escape. I can guide you to freedom.
An old friend told me I'd find a dark ally here. I think he meant you.
I believe you.
I will always be Sith--but that does not mean we can't work together.
If I'm taking you to the Jedi homeworld, you'll be under guard at all times. Don't try anything.
You're a security risk.
Your flattery is pointless. I do not seek your people's deaths--only their cooperation.
Security won't be an issue. He twitches wrong, he's dead.
Sergeant Rusk, put a slave collar on our new friend.
Then become my slave.
One wrong move, Sith, and we won't need a lightsaber to remove your head.
Time is a luxury we no longer possess. We must go--now. I will navigate us through the defense grid.
There was another pair of "special" Jedi who tried to defeat the Emperor. You stopped them.
So were Revan and the Exile.
Revan and the Jedi Exile were the greatest adversaries I ever faced--and before that, they were allies.
But it was not their destiny to defeat the Emperor. It's yours.
If that's true, shouldn't you be trying to stop me?
Then we should be enemies.
Were I still the Emperor's Wrath, yes. Fortunately for you, I have recently abandoned that title.
You expect me to trust you?
Sith are masters of deceit.
No. I expect you to lead me.
He was the wrong target. They should've killed you first.
If only they'd defeated you.
If they had, the galaxy would be doomed.
You are the Jedi's finest. It is not enough to save you.
I'm not trying to kill you. Believe it or not, I'm here to help.
You don't have to die.
You'd be surprised what I believe.
I'm here for your master. If you want to live, leave him to me.
All I want is the Emperor.
You haven't earned an audience with him. Be careful what you wish for.
Tough talk from someone who's losing this fight.
Is that fear I detect?
Be careful. Arrogance is a weakness freely exploited.
Surrender, Sith. You and your master cannot stand against all of us.
Thank the Force. He told me you were all dead.
Master Braga, you're alive!
Have faith, my friend--the Force is a powerful ally. The Emperor's reign ends today.
I knew you weren't dead. What took you so long?
It's about time.
We discovered a few changes to the security grid--nothing we couldn't handle. Now let's finish this.
Stay back. The Emperor and his "Wrath" are all mine.
Let me handle this.
Remember our purpose. The Emperor is within our reach.
Misdirected passion. Such a waste.
My friends and I wish to speak with you. Please accompany us to Tython.
An infantile display, Tol Braga. Reckless pride limned by self-righteousness. You are master of nothing.
You can insult us all you want from your cell--but you are coming with us.
Surrender, Emperor.
I don't remember introducing ourselves.
How do you know his name?
You have no secrets from me.
I knew you wouldn't come quietly. I will end you here and now.
It's time you were destroyed.
You mistake me for your own weak flesh. I do not end.
You stand there because I allow it. Because I do not fear.
Fight back! We can resist him!
You are mine. Servants. Slaves. Weapons. And you will obey....
You violate the Emperor's sanctum. There is only one punishment.
The Emperor's Wrath. You left empty-handed on Quesh. Prepare for another disappointment.
I remember you from Quesh.
Lay down your weapons. I'm taking both of you in.
Surrender, both of you.
There will be no mercies here.
Your friends did not survive. You fight alone.
Maybe you didn't see me? Right here. The name's Doc.
Not alone. The Force is with us.
Weapons armed. Just say the word.
Emperor's Wrath + Emperor = two targets // T7 = taking Emperor?
By my master's command, you must die.
The only one getting punished will be you.
You're mistaken. [Attack.]
Three hundred years?
